name: Armagod
description:
Armagod is a mobile prototype designed and developed by a group of students. The general idea came from Avatar the Last Air Bender, but instead of a human it is an armadillo.

This benevolent armadillo has the power to control all four elements: fire, earth, water, and air. It is the armadillo's mission to restore the balance of the elements to the world. Starting at the Earth's core, the armadillo must make their way out and into the atmosphere to have any real effect over the unbalanced elements.

Only programmed for Android devices, uses touch and accelerometer for controls.
